label: uncl4471
comment: Code specifying the means of settlement.

values.label: Bill back
values.comment: Refers to a charge or allowance for the buyer and the buyer will bill back the seller.

values.label: Off invoice
values.comment: The allowance or charge is being deducted from the invoice.

values.label: Vendor check to customer
values.comment: An allowance will be given to a customer from the supplier in the form of a check.

values.label: Credit customer account
values.comment: An allowance will be processed for the customer by giving a credit to their account.

values.label: Charge to be paid by vendor
values.comment: A charge whose payment will be made by the vendor.

values.label: Charge to be paid by customer
values.comment: A charge whose payment will be made by the customer.

values.label: Optional
values.comment: The settlement of charges is not obligatory.

values.label: Off gross quantity invoiced
values.comment: Allowance as relates to the gross quantity invoiced.

values.label: Electric cost recovery factor
values.comment: An allowance as it relates to the electric cost recovery factor.

values.label: Gas cost recovery factor
values.comment: An allowance as it relates to the gas cost recovery factor.

values.label: Prior credit balance
values.comment: A settlement was made using a previous credit balance.

values.label: Non-dutiable
values.comment: Reference to an allowance or charge as being free for Customs duty computation purposes.

values.label: All charges borne by payee
values.comment: All charges are to be borne by the funds receiver.

values.label: Each pay own cost
values.comment: Each party are to be responsible for its own charges.

values.label: All charges borne by payer
values.comment: All charges are to be borne by the funds sender.

values.label: All bank charges to be borne by applicant
values.comment: All bank charges associated with a documentary credit are to be borne by the applicant.

values.label: All bank charges except confirmation commission to be borne by applicant
values.comment: All bank charges associated with a documentary credit except confirmation commission are to borne by the applicant.

values.label: All bank charges to be borne by beneficiary
values.comment: All bank charges associated with a documentary credit are to be borne by the beneficiary.

values.label: Total payment borne by project
values.comment: The total payment is borne by the project.

values.label: Amendment charges to be borne by applicant
values.comment: Documentary credit amendment charges are to be borne by the applicant.

values.label: Amendment charges to be borne by beneficiary
values.comment: Documentary credit amendment charges are to be borne by the beneficiary.

values.label: Discount charges to be borne by applicant
values.comment: Documentary credit discount charges are to be borne by the applicant.

values.label: Discount charges to be borne by beneficiary
values.comment: Documentary credit discount charges are to be borne by the beneficiary.

values.label: All bank charges other than those of the issuing bank to be borne by beneficiary
values.comment: All bank charges associated with a documentary credit other than those of the issuing bank are to be borne by the beneficiary.

values.label: Amendment charges other than those of the issuing bank to be borne by beneficiary
values.comment: All charges associated with the amendment other than those of the issuing bank are to be borne by the beneficiary.

values.label: All charges to be paid by the principal of the collection
values.comment: All charges are to be paid by the principal of the collection.

values.label: All charges to be paid by the drawee of the collection
values.comment: All charges are to be paid by the drawee of the collection.

values.label: All charges to be borne by the drawee except those levied by the remitting bank, to be paid by principal
values.comment: All charges are to be borne by the drawee except those levied by the remitting bank, which are to be paid by the principal.

values.label: All bank charges are to be paid by the principal of the documentary credit collection
values.comment: All bank charges are to be paid by the principal of the documentary credit collection.

values.label: All bank charges to be borne by receiving bank
values.comment: All bank charges are to be borne by the receiving bank.

values.label: All bank charges to be borne by sending bank
values.comment: All bank charges are to be borne by the sending bank.

values.label: Charges levied by a third bank
values.comment: Charges levied by a third bank.

values.label: Information charges levied by a third bank
values.comment: Charges levied by a third bank for providing information.

values.label: Total payment borne by patient
values.comment: The total payment is borne by the patient.

values.label: Part payment borne by patient
values.comment: The part payment is borne by the patient.

values.label: No charge to patient
values.comment: No charges to be paid by the patient.

values.label: Divided according to national health service rules
values.comment: Charge is divided between parties according to national health service rules.

values.label: Item accruals
values.comment: Expenses related to an item for which invoices have not been received yet at the end of the current acounting period.

values.label: Vendor accruals
values.comment: Expenses related to a vendor for which invoices have not been received yet at the end of the current accounting period.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code reserved for special trading partner requirements when pre-defined codes do not exist.
